name: Irish Coffee
description:
It's a beautiful day in tokyo: The sun's shining, the birds are singing, and it's pissing down with rain. Oh well, time for some coffee

Put on some music, make a fresh pot of coffee, check the mail for new cases, and just relax

CONTROLS:

Walk, Interact: Left click

Look: Right click

Inventory: Move your mouse to the top of the screen, dummy

Deselect inventory item: Left click

Coder, Writer: Peronjames

Artist, Animator, Page design: Janeator
